product_name: Theo Chocolate Classic Chocolate Bar - 3 oz.
long_description: Theo Classic chocolate bars satisfy your sweet tooth with the simple pleasure of chocolate combined with almonds, orange, cherries, chiles or coconut. Spicy Chili Dark Chocolate flavor combines 70% dark chocolate with the warmth of guajillo chile and cinnamon, the tanginess of pasilla chile, and a subtle hint of citrus. Orange Dark Chocolate flavor blends rich 70% dark chocolate with the essence of fresh oranges. Cherry and Almond Dark Chocolate flavor features rich 70% dark chocolate combined with tangy, sweet dried organic cherries and crunchy roasted almonds. Toasted Coconut Dark Chocolate flavor adds the sweet tropical flavor of toasted coconut to 70% dark chocolate. Salted Almond Milk Chocolate flavor includes 45% milk chocolate, chunks of almonds and just the right amount of salt. Bars are Fair Trade Certified(TM) and organic. All flavors may contain nuts, seeds or nut/seed residue as well as trace amounts of dairy. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Theo Classic chocolate bars satisfy your sweet tooth with the simple pleasure of chocolate combined with almonds, orange, cherries, chiles or coconut.
